```{r cars}
source("ggplot_theme_Publication.R")
vacc <- ("/dados/Analysis/Thiago/DB_processed/db_vacine111121/")
vacc <- vacc %>% mutate(flag_incon=case_when(
  d2_data_aplicacao-d1_data_aplicacao<13~1L,
  d1_data_aplicacao<"2021-01-18"~1L,
  !is.na(d2_nome_vacina )& d2_nome_vacina!=d1_nome_vacina~1L,
  TRUE~0L
))

vacc_clean <- vacc %>% filter(flag_incon==0, d_idade>11)

```



```{r plot_vaccine_uptake, echo=FALSE}
first_dose_g <- vacc_clean %>% filter(!is.na(d1_data_aplicacao),d1_data_aplicacao>"2021-01-17",d1_data_aplicacao<"2021-12-10")%>%mutate(
    faixa_etaria = case_when( 
      d_idade <18~"12-17",
      d_idade <60 ~ "18-59",
      d_idade < 80 ~ "60-79",
      d_idade >= 80 ~ "80+"
    )) %>% 
  group_by(d1_data_aplicacao, faixa_etaria) %>%
  count(name = "vacinacao_por_faixa_etaria") %>%
  group_by(faixa_etaria) %>%
  arrange(d1_data_aplicacao) %>%
  mutate(
    cobertura_por_dia_cumu =
      cumsum(vacinacao_por_faixa_etaria)
  ) %>% mutate(cobertura_perc_cum=case_when(
  faixa_etaria=="12-17"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/18092894,
  faixa_etaria=="18-59"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/128714674,
  faixa_etaria=="60-79"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/26712827,
  faixa_etaria=="80+"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/4617408))%>% ggplot(aes(d1_data_aplicacao,cobertura_perc_cum,color=faixa_etaria))+geom_line(size=1, alpha=0.8)+scale_x_date(breaks = "1 month",date_labels = "%B")+scale_y_continuous(labels=scales::percent)+ theme_Publication()+labs(x="Month",y="Cumulative uptake %",color="Age Group", title = "1st dose")+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))+ggsci::scale_color_lancet()

type_graph <- vacc_clean %>% filter(!is.na(d3_data_aplicacao),d3_data_aplicacao>"2021-08-01",d3_data_aplicacao<"2021-12-12",d1_nome_vacina=="Covid-19-Coronavac-Sinovac/Butantan")%>% mutate(d1_nome_vacina=case_when(

    d3_nome_vacina=="Vacina covid-19 - BNT162b2 - BioNTech/Fosun Pharma/Pfizer"~"BNT162b2")) %>%mutate(
    faixa_etaria = case_when(

    ),comb_3rddose=paste0(d1_nome_vacina,d3_nome_vacina))  %>% 
  group_by(d3_data_aplicacao, comb_3rddose) %>%
  count(name = "vacinacao_por_terceira") %>% 
  group_by(comb_3rddose) %>%
  arrange(d3_data_aplicacao) %>%

                          comb_3rddose=="CVAZ"~"ChAdOx1",
                          comb_3rddose=="CVAd26"~"Ad26.COV2.S",
                          comb_3rddose=="CVBNT162b2"~"BNT162b2"))  %>% complete(nesting(comb_3rddose), d3_data_aplicacao = seq(min(d3_data_aplicacao), as.Date("2021-12-12"), by = "day")) %>%  arrange(d3_data_aplicacao, comb_3rddose) %>%
  fill(cobertura_perc_cum, .direction = "down") %>% ggplot(aes(d3_data_aplicacao,cobertura_perc_cum,fill=comb_3rddose))+geom_area(size=0.2, alpha=0.8)+scale_x_date(breaks = "1 month",date_labels = "%b/%Y")+scale_y_continuous(labels=scales::percent, limits = c(0,1))+ theme_Publication()+labs(x="",y="% of 3rd doses \nby vaccine",fill="Vaccine:", title = "Fully vaccinated with CoronaVac")+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))

vacc_clean <- vacc %>% filter(flag_incon==0, d_idade>11) %>% mutate(d1_nome_vacina=case_when(
  d1_nome_vacina=="Covid-19-AstraZeneca"~"ChAdOx1",
  d1_nome_vacina=="Covid-19-Coronavac-Sinovac/Butantan"~"CoronaVac",
  d1_nome_vacina=="Vacina covid-19 - Ad26.COV2.S - Janssen-Cilag"~"Ad26.COV2.S",
  d1_nome_vacina=="Vacina covid-19 - BNT162b2 - BioNTech/Fosun Pharma/Pfizer"~"BNT162b2"),
  d2_nome_vacina=case_when(
  d2_nome_vacina=="Covid-19-AstraZeneca"~"ChAdOx1",
  d2_nome_vacina=="Covid-19-Coronavac-Sinovac/Butantan"~"CoronaVac",
  d2_nome_vacina=="Vacina covid-19 - Ad26.COV2.S - Janssen-Cilag"~"Ad26.COV2.S",
  d2_nome_vacina=="Vacina covid-19 - BNT162b2 - BioNTech/Fosun Pharma/Pfizer"~"BNT162b2"))


cumulatives <- vacc_clean %>% filter(d2_nome_vacina!="Ad26.COV2.S" | is.na(d2_nome_vacina))%>%filter(case_when(
    str_detect(d1_nome_vacina, "Ad26") ~ d1_data_aplicacao > "2021-04-30",
    str_detect(d1_nome_vacina, "BNT") ~ d1_data_aplicacao > "2021-04-30",
    TRUE ~ TRUE
  )) %>% droplevels() %>%  select(d1_data_aplicacao,d2_data_aplicacao,d1_nome_vacina,id_vigvac,d_idade) %>% pivot_longer(-c(id_vigvac,d1_nome_vacina,d_idade), names_to="dose", values_to="data")%>%droplevels() %>%
  mutate(
    faixa_etaria = case_when(
      d_idade < 18 ~ "12-17",
      d_idade < 60 ~ "18-59",
      d_idade >= 60 ~ "60+"
    )
  ) %>% mutate(d1_nome_vacina=fct_relevel(d1_nome_vacina,"BNT162b2","ChAdOx1","CoronaVac","Ad26.COV2.S")) %>%
  group_by(d1_nome_vacina,data,dose, faixa_etaria) %>%
  count(name = "vac_fe_dose") %>%
  group_by(d1_nome_vacina,dose, faixa_etaria) %>%
  arrange(data) %>%  mutate(
    cobertura_por_dia_cumu =
      cumsum(vac_fe_dose)
  )%>%
  mutate(cobertura_perc_cum = case_when(
    faixa_etaria=="12-17"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/18092894,
  faixa_etaria=="18-59"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/128714674,
  faixa_etaria=="60+"~cobertura_por_dia_cumu/31330235
  ))

plot_geral <- cumulatives %>%
  filter(!is.na(data)) %>%
  rename(dia = data) %>%
  complete(nesting(d1_nome_vacina, faixa_etaria), dia = seq(min(dia), as.Date("2021-11-11"), by = "day")) %>%
  rename(data = dia) %>%
  arrange(d1_nome_vacina, faixa_etaria, data) %>%
  fill(cobertura_perc_cum, .direction = "down") %>%
  ggplot(aes(data, cobertura_perc_cum, fill = d1_nome_vacina)) +
  geom_area(size = .5, alpha = 0.8, color = "black") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent, limits = c(0, 1)) +
  theme_Publication() +
  labs(x = "", y = "Cumulative uptake %", fill = "Vaccine", title = "") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5), panel.spacing.x = unit(2, "lines"),panel.spacing.y = unit(2, "lines")) +
  scale_colour_Publication() +
  facet_wrap(~ faixa_etaria + dose, ncol = 2) +
  scale_x_date(date_labels = "%b\n%Y ", limits = c(as.Date("2021-01-01"), as.Date("2021-11-11")), date_breaks = "1 month") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, vjust = 0.4), )

library(egg)
tag_facet_outside(plot1)

top_labels <- c("First dose","Second dose")
side_labels <- c("12-17","18-59", "60+")
tag_facet_outside(plot_geral, open = c("",""), close=c("",""),
                  tag_fun_top = function(i) top_labels[i],
                  tag_fun_right = function(i) side_labels[i],
                  x=c(0.4,0),y=c(0.5,.5))
vac2 <- tag_facet_outside(plot2,
                  tag_fun_top = function(i) top_labels[i],
                  x=c(0.4,0),y=c(0.5,.5))

  scale_colour_Publication() + guides(fill="none")
```

```{r}
lab.data <- read_rds("data/tnd0812.RDS")

# Filter inconsistencies and notifications before covid-19 pandemic - removed 81,513 rows
lab.data <- lab.data %>% filter(dt_notificacao<dt_inicio_sintomas)

infection <- lab.data %>% filter(!duplicated(paste0(id_vigvac,dt_coleta,confirmado)))


datebreaks <- seq(as.Date("2020-02-01"), as.Date("2021-11-11"), by="3 month")

infection_plot <- infection %>% filter(confirmado=="Confirmado") %>%  ggplot(aes(dt_inicio_sintomas))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 7, fill="goldenrod3", alpha=0.7,color="black")+theme_Publication()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%b\n%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-12")))+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust = .25), legend.position = "bottom")+ labs(x="Date of symptom onset",y="Weekly\nCOVID-19 cases",fill="")+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma, limits = c(0,4e5), breaks=seq(0,4e5,1e5))


hospitalization <- lab.data %>% arrange(srag_dt_interna) %>%  filter(!duplicated(paste0(id_vigvac,srag_dt_interna,confirmado)))%>%  filter(confirmado=="Confirmado" & srag_hospital=="1")

hospitalization %>% filter(!is.na(srag_dt_interna),confirmado=="Confirmado",srag_dt_interna>"2020-01-11", srag_dt_interna<"2021-11-11")%>% ggplot(aes(srag_dt_interna))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 7)+theme_Publication()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%B/%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-12")))+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, vjust = .25), legend.position = "bottom")+labs(x="Date of admission", y= "Number of hospitalizations")+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma, limits = c(0,4e4), breaks=seq(0,4e4,1e4))


death <- lab.data %>% arrange(srag_dt_evoluca) %>%  filter(confirmado=="Confirmado" & srag_evolucao %in% c(2,3))


death %>% filter(!is.na(srag_dt_interna),confirmado=="Confirmado",srag_dt_evoluca>"2020-01-11", srag_dt_evoluca<"2021-11-11")%>% ggplot(aes(srag_dt_evoluca))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 7)+theme_Publication()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%B/%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-11")))+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, vjust = .25), legend.position = "bottom")+labs(x="Date of death", y= "Number of deaths")+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma, limits = c(0,1.5e4), breaks=seq(0,1.5e4,.5e4))


only_death <- anti_join(death,hospitalization,by="id_vigvac")

severe_outcomes <- bind_rows(only_death,hospitalization) %>% select(id_vigvac,confirmado,srag_hospital,srag_dt_interna,srag_evolucao,srag_dt_evoluca) %>% mutate(data_severe=coalesce(srag_dt_interna,srag_dt_evoluca))

severe_plot <- severe_outcomes %>% filter(!is.na(data_severe),confirmado=="Confirmado",data_severe>"2020-02-11", data_severe<"2021-11-11")%>% ggplot(aes(data_severe))+ geom_histogram(binwidth = 7, fill="darkred", alpha=0.7,color="black")+theme_Publication()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%b\n%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-11")))+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust = .25), legend.position = "bottom")+labs(x="Date of hospitalization or death", y= "Weekly\nhospitalization or death")+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma, limits = c(0,4e4), breaks=seq(0,4e4,1e4))


plot11 <- plot1+geom_area(color="black", alpha=0.6)+labs(y="Rollout %\nFirst dose", fill="Vaccine")+ggsci::scale_fill_jama()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%b\n%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-11")))+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust=0.4))

plot12 <- plot2+geom_area(color="black", alpha=0.6)+labs(y="Rollout %\nSecond dose",fill="Vaccine")+ggsci::scale_fill_jama()+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%b\n%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-11-11")))+ theme(legend.position = "none", axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust=0.4),)
```

```{r}

teste <- as.Date(voc$periodo, format = "%b %Y")
voc <-readxl::read_excel("variant_nov.xlsx")
voc <- janitor::clean_names(voc)
voc_jul <- voc %>%
  mutate(
    variante = case_when(
      classificacao == "Não VOC/VOI"~ "Non VOC/VOI",
      str_detect(variante, "Gama")~"Gamma",
      str_detect(variante,"Delta")~"Delta",
      TRUE~variante)
  ) %>%
  mutate(variante = fct_lump(variante, 3, w = quantidade)) %>%
  mutate(
    periodo = fct_recode(factor(periodo),
                         "Nov/2020" = "Nov 2020",
                         "Dec/2020" = "Dez 2020",
                         "Jan/2021" = "Jan 2021",
                         "Feb/2021" = "Fev 2021",
                         "Mar/2021" = "Mar 2021",
                         "Apr/2021" = "Abr 2021",
                         "May/2021" = "Mai 2021",
                         "Jun/2021" = "Jun 2021",
                         "Jul/2021" = "Jul 2021",
                         "Aug/2021" = "Ago 2021",
                         "Sept/2021" = "Set 2021",
                         "Oct/2021" = "Out 2021",
                         "Nov/2021" = "Nov 2021"
    ),
    periodo = fct_relevel(periodo,"Nov/2020","Dec/2020", "Jan/2021", "Feb/2021", "Mar/2021", "Apr/2021", "May/2021", "Jun/2021", "Jul/2021","Aug/2021","Sept/2021","Oct/2021","Nov/2021"),
    variante=fct_relevel(variante,"Non VOC/VOI","Gamma","Delta","Other")
  ) %>% mutate(regiao = recode_factor(factor(regiao),
                                            "Nordeste" = "Northeast",
                                            "Norte" = "North",
                                            "Sudeste" = "Southeast",
                                            "Sul" = "South",
                                            "Centro-oeste" = "Central West"),
               periodo=lubridate::my(periodo)) 


variant <- voc_jul %>% mutate(periodo=periodo+15) %>% 
    group_by(periodo) %>%
    count(variante,wt=quantidade) %>%
    mutate(percentualnogrupo =(n / sum(n))) %>%
    ggplot(aes(periodo, y = percentualnogrupo, fill = variante)) +geom_col()+theme_minimal()+ggsci::scale_fill_lancet()+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent)+
  labs(x="", y="% Variant", fill="Variant")+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0, vjust=0.4), legend.position = "bottom")+scale_x_date(breaks = datebreaks,date_labels = "%b\n%Y ",limits=c(as.Date("2020-02-01"),as.Date("2021-12-11")))+theme_Publication()
```
